long_description: The Pepper's Quiet Storm polarized sunglasses are ready for summer's brightest days. With a sleek style and great fit, these sunglasses will be your first choice for sun-filled fun. Polarized lenses reduce 99% of visible glare from water, snow, sand and pavement for increased visual acuity and decreased eye strain. Triacetate lens construction sandwiches a polyvinyl acetate layer between 2 outer acetate layers. Grilamid(R) nylon lightweight frames offer a consistent fit and flexibility at any temperature. Matte black frames feature brown polarized lenses with blue ice mirror finish for reduced glare and true color perception in bright conditions. Pepper's Quiet Storm polarized sunglasses are designed to fit medium- and large-sized faces.
short_description: The Pepper's Quiet Storm polarized sunglasses are ready for summer's brightest days. With a sleek style and great fit, these sunglasses will be your first choice for sun-filled fun.
